entries.title: Kolnari Prologue
entries.description: The Kolnari Empire has stood for hundreds of years, exploring and cultivating the galaxy. A small xeno-anthropological survey team finds themselves stranded in a deeply dangerous predicament. Will they be able to escape? Will the risks they take be worth it?

entries.title: Ochre Sky
entries.description: Ochre Sky is an ultra-realistic near-future adventure following a group of friends and researchers on a Venus science station. Worldbuilding takes center stage before everything turns upside down. What will happen, floating over their beautiful ball of boiling acid?

entries.title: Bingo Belt Boys
entries.description: Ananya just needed to break away from her overbearing parents and their incessant plan, but now she finds herself a middle manager on a backwater asteroid mining facility on the far side of the sun. Will she survive the psychological and visceral threats?

entries.title: Hemmer
entries.description: Professor Dr JG Hemmer is a reclusive specialist in the area of genomics. His story is not his to tell. Dive into a thrilling near-future science fiction adventure through a dystopian vision so close to our world you might see your house from there. From Rotterdam to Wolfsburg Germany, through the Earth-bound Tyson Station all the way to Venus, we have a chance to integrate into a variety of cultures along the way. What is the core conflict between Earth and the Spacers? Who struck first and why? What kind of weapons do you use in a pressurized space ship? Will Jamie ever find a job? Hemmer is a fast-paced and funny scifi action adventure from acclaimed author Robert Willnow, clocking in as the fourth installment in the Written By Victors series.

entries.title: VS Code Bulk Create Extension
entries.description: Efficient extension for Visual Studio Code allows for bulk creation of files and folders. Usable for AI copilots and chatbots.

entries.title: HotGato Speed Reader
entries.description: JavaScript speed reading webapp that can be used offline for secure documents. Supports words per minute, chunk size, punctuation pauses, and 'bionic reading' mode.

entries.title: HotGato Speed Reader Chrome Extension
entries.description: Speed reading extension right in your browser. Just select some text, right-click, and select HotGato Speed Read. Boom, the whole article will be loaded into the HotGato popup for you to zip through! Perfect for scanning long articles and reviewing documents.

entries.title: oBalls Physics Game
entries.description: Physics engine game. Managing the audio system was a fun challenge with caching and volume scaling. My toddler loves it.

entries.title: ADHD Quiz
entries.description: An uplifting personality quiz with random questions. The goal is to be positive and highlight historical neurodivergent figures.

entries.title: Click2Highlight
entries.description: A simple tool to double-click and highlight any text block on a page. Insert a span around selected text, and double-click to remove it.

entries.title: NoSpoilers Chrome Extension
entries.description: Chrome extension for hiding text blocks containing user-specified keywords. Grays out text to help avoid spoilers or unwanted information.

entries.title: Robert Willnow Author Site
entries.description: Simple author website for Robert Willnow, acclaimed American science fiction author.
